title: buff zed please its obvious and unfair!!!
body: zeds hole game phase is so weak especially with the new akalli rework now and apart from all the double zonyax items etc . Also in order to carry a game u need to be a perfect zed and hit all ur abilities clean while other less difficulty level champions counter u very easily such as yi jax etc  .and even if u go late game u don't do much just take the adc . Riot please its obvious that u destroyed this champion , its a mostly mele champion and he should  do more damage have less cooldowns since you miss your w e q then you are dead .

replies.body: This is a troll post right?

has to be
no its not do you play zed ? and whats your opinion about my manner ?

> [{quoted}](name=The Vape King,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fV9KNmB0,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-08-06T19:50:33.440+0000)
>
> no its not do you play zed ? and whats your opinion about my manner ?

His W>E>Q +electrocute does like 75% of your HP from a safe distance. You want him to do more damage? Get out of here.

I agree with your opinion. They are nerfing dusk and electrocute and scorch make zed even weaker and these guys that say zed is way to strong have no idea how zed is actually weak unless you are super clean and hit all your  spells

"unless you are super clean and hit all your spells"
lol because you consider an ad caster missing his skills and still killing an enemy is fair ?
have you ever tried zed bro ? it is difficult to land your q and if u don't u basically do nothing !
That's like playing Ahri and cry that you don't deal damage if you miss your charm
sure but with ahri u do much more damage bro especially if you hit it right (passive). with zed u need to land 10 q to mach ahris damage potential
You must be a really bad Zed player then
no am afraid you must just hate zed and clearly dont understand his laning phase
thank u for the empathy bro :P epsecially with champions that can poke you very easy in the laning phase in most match ups u play passive and that sucks !
I really wish that title is supposed to mean the opposite.
why do you say that express yourself

Yer a damned fool for speakin them words around these here parts.

I do agree he needs a buff-- but not ATM, and not a damage one. He'll definitely be weaker when the nerfs for Elec and Sudden Impact and Duskblade go through, but he's fine at the moment.
This is funny, seeing as Katarina hasnâ€™t had a buff for over a year, I think I know who might (hopefully) be higher priority than Zed.
